document_title: Inspection and Citation Guidance for Roadway and Highway Construction Work Zones
applicable_stakeholders: OSHA Compliance Safety and Health Officers
description: OSHA Instruction providing guidance to Compliance Safety and Health Officers (CSHOs) on safely inspecting roadway and highway construction work zones and issuing consistent citations related to struck-by hazards from vehicular traffic. The instruction applies OSHA-wide and addresses inspection procedures, hazard recognition, and enforcement considerations.
